document.full_text: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi killed 18 civilians in the city of misrata on tuesday and government troops are still firing tank shells and fighting skirmishes with rebels, a rebel spokesman said.
document.title: misrata battle killed 18 residents on tuesday: rebels
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to libyan leader muammar gaddafi killed 18 civilians in the city of misrata on tuesday and government troops are still firing tank shells and fighting skirmishes with rebels, a rebel spokesman said.
